HomePage.text2: We Complete The Sweetness Of Life!
HomePage.text13: Looking for natural sweetener alternatives in baked goods, packaged foods, and drinks like coffee and tea.
HomePage.text15: That prioritize natural flavors and premium quality.
HomePage.text17: Including organic, vegan, or low-GI product lines
HomePage.text19: Who are switching to healthier, more natural sweeteners as part of their daily lifestyle.

Footer.text1: PT Indosweet Jaya Nusantara is a proudly Indonesian company focused on producing premium palm sugar and coconut sugar. Through our fully in-house production system, we ensure every batch meets consistent quality, safety, and flavor crafted with care and backed by strict standards by using 100% pure palm nectar.

AboutUs.text6: Rooted in the natural richness of Indonesia, we transform traditional, natural ingredients into modern sweeteners that are pure, healthy, and premium in quality. Created from 100% palm sap, our products are the ideal choice for those who seek sweetness that is natural, clean, and better for your health—whether for personal use or industrial needs.
AboutUs.text7: We believe sweetness should never come at the cost of wellness. That’s why we’re here— Our sweetness meets your sweet needs!
AboutUs.text9: To be the global face of Indonesia’s natural sweeteners—pure, high-quality, healthy, and responsibly made.
AboutUs.text11: To craft 100% palm sap -based sweeteners using sustainable and hygienic manufacturing practices.
AboutUs.text12: To deliver consistent, premium quality—100% in-house.
AboutUs.text13: To introduce Indonesia’s natural sweetness to the global market.
AboutUs.text14: To build long-term partnerships with clients who value authenticity, health, and innovation.
AboutUs.text15: To empower local communities through fair sourcing and job creation

OurProducts.text3: Artisanal, rustic, and powerfully flavorful — Gowla Hanau is arenga sugar in its boldest form. Handcrafted into dense, smoky blocks of earthy sweetness, perfect for grating, melting, or shaving into anything from curries to confections. Bring back the soul of ancient kitchens.
OurProducts.text4: Golden, fragrant, and irresistibly rich — Gowla Hanau Semut is not just a sweetener, it’s a story of nature’s perfection. Made from 100% pure arenga nectar, our granulated palm sugar adds deep caramel tones to your coffee, desserts, and sauces. No additives, no compromise — just authentic indulgence in every grain.
OurProducts.text5: Rich like molasses, smooth like honey — Gowla Hanau Sirup delivers a luxurious drizzle of tropical sweetness to every plate. Made from 100% concentrated arenga sap, it’s perfect for pancakes, cocktails, glazes, or just a spoonful straight from the jar. Sustainably crafted with love from Indonesia.
OurProducts.text6: Traditional, dense, and fragrant — Gowla Java Block is coconut sugar molded into rustic blocks with deep sweetness and a naturally smoky note. Ideal for melting, grating, or mixing into both sweet and savory recipes.
OurProducts.text7: Toasty, floral, and naturally golden — Gowla Java Semut is a granulated coconut sugar made from 100% pure coconut blossom nectar. Gently processed to preserve its natural minerals and low glycemic index, this sugar adds soft caramel notes to coffee, baking, and savory sauces.
OurProducts.text8: Smooth and richly sweet, Gowla Java Sirup is made from slow-cooked coconut flower sap — forming a thick, golden syrup with mellow notes and natural minerals. Perfect for pancakes, drinks, yogurt, or even salad dressings.

arenga-sugar-block.title: Gowla Hanau – Arenga Sugar Block
arenga-sugar-block.description: Authentic and bold, Gowla Hanau reconnects you with tradition. Hand-poured into rich, earthy blocks, this is the sugar your grandmother would trust — naturally sweet and deeply aromatic.
list: Custom size and packaging available upon request

arenga-sugar-granulated.title: Gowla Hanau Semut – Arenga Sugar Granulated
arenga-sugar-granulated.description: Deep, aromatic, and beautifully golden — Gowla Hanau Semut turns everyday dishes into something extraordinary. This granulated arenga sugar (a rare type of palm sugar) is perfect for drinks, baking, and sauces — your daily dose of natural luxury.
list: Net weight: 20 Kg (also available on small packaging up to 500 gr)
Packaging: 20 Kg per zak or by request
Custom size and packaging available upon request

arenga-sugar-syrup.title: Gowla Hanau Sirup – Arenga Sugar Syrup
arenga-sugar-syrup.description: Velvety, aromatic, and deeply flavorful — Gowla Hanau Sirup flows with the natural richness of arenga. A must-have for pancakes, desserts, drinks, or glazes. Taste it once, and it stays in your kitchen forever.
list: Custom size and packaging available upon request

coconut-sugar-block.title: Gowla Java – Coconut Sugar Block
coconut-sugar-block.description: Hand-shaped and naturally dried, this sugar block retains the bold essence of coconut nectar — pure, unrefined, and ready for everyday or heritage recipes.
list: Custom size and packaging available upon request

coconut-sugar-granulated.title: Gowla Java Semut – Coconut Sugar Granulated
coconut-sugar-granulated.description: This granulated coconut sugar is a healthier, natural sweetener made for modern kitchens. Unrefined, vegan-friendly, and full of tropical character.
list: Net weight: 20 Kg (also available on small packaging up to 500 gr
Packaging: 20 Kg per zak or by request
Custom size and packaging available upon request

coconut-sugar-syrup.title: Gowla Java Sirup – Coconut Sugar Syrup
coconut-sugar-syrup.description: This natural coconut nectar syrup is a healthy, tropical alternative to maple or honey. Unrefined, antioxidant-rich, and crafted for modern kitchens.
list: Custom size and packaging available upon request
